metadata.synopsis: Laezel can rejoin the party after leaving the player to stay and explore the Creche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Laezel after she stays behind in the Creche.

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: Hurry. We must explore the crèche - purification awaits.
2.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: You still survive. An impressive feat, given the visitor lodged in your head.
9.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: The githyanki of the Sword Coast have a cure in their crèche, which I believe to be near. It's time you lend me your skills. Together, we can finally be cleansed.

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: Hurry. We must enter the Prism.
23.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.text: Good - you've come to your senses. Come, to the crèche. Let us be cleansed of our tadpoles.
35.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

40.speaker: Lae'zel
40.text: So you've seen reason. Truth be told, I'm -
40.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

31.speaker: Lae'zel
31.text: Never mind. Come with me - I must enter the Prism. Vlaakith commanded it.
31.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: Never mind. Come with me, and let us be purified.
65.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Agreed. Let's find the crèche and get our cure.
7.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

55.speaker: Player
55.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: You were going to say something. Go on, tell me.
52.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Tell me what you wanted to say. Or maybe you'd rather go it alone...
43.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

69.speaker: Lae'zel
69.text: I'm glad you came back, all right?
69.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: I'm glad you came back, all right?
41.context: NodeContext: Outburst: Player has dragged it out of her: Lae'zel wants the player around. As much as she hates to admit.

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: Now let's move, before this discussion turns maudlin.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: I missed you too. Now let's finish this crèche business.
63.context: NodeContext: Hemming and hawing over this display of odd sentimentality.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I missed you too. Now let's find this crèche, shall we?
30.context: NodeContext: Hemming and hawing over this display of odd sentimentality.

64.speaker: Lae'zel
64.context: NodeContext: Hemming and hawing over this display of odd sentimentality.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: All right. Join me, and let's explore the crèche.

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: It's not your choice to make. Let me speak with your leader.

83.speaker: Lae'zel
83.text: You will need to make room. See that it happens.

81.speaker: Lae'zel
81.text: You will need to make room. See that it happens.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: All right. Join me, and let's find this crèche.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: I'll come back when I'm ready.

76.speaker: Lae'zel
76.text: I'll wait. But I won't wait long.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Wait here. I'll be back when I'm ready.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: Never mind. Come with me. We will scour the crèche. I will have answers.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: Never mind. Come with me - I must enter the Prism. Something awaits there. Something precious to Vlaakith.

58.speaker: Narrator
58.text: *Your skull briefly aches, and you are her. She has come to this place seeking aid from her people - a cure for the parasite.*

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: I remember. You were on the gh'ath. The nautiloid. You carry a tadpole.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: The githyanki of the Sword Coast have a cure in their crèche, which I believe to be near. Lend me your skills, and let us be cleansed together.

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: The crèche's ghustil - its doctor - has the means to cleanse us.

4.speaker: Lae'zel
4.text: So says my queen's teachings, and so it must be.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: And what is a crèche, exactly...?

34.speaker: Lae'zel
34.text: It is many things. A hatchery, a training grounds, a shelter.

56.speaker: Lae'zel
56.text: Githyanki protocol is clear: when infected with a ghaik tadpole, we must report to a ghustil for purification.

25.speaker: Lae'zel
25.text: One is close at hand. Nestled here in this pass, quite possibly.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Our people know a cure? Where can we find this crèche?

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: Nestled here in the pass, quite possibly.

62.speaker: Lae'zel
62.text: Now come. We must find it and report to a ghustil for purification.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: All right. Let's group up and go to this crèche.

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.text: You do not have the authority. Defer to your leader.

68.speaker: Lae'zel
68.text: I will be at your camp. Do not keep me waiting.

61.text: I will be at your camp. Do not keep me waiting.

33.speaker: Lae'zel
33.text: I will be at your camp. Do not keep me waiting.

82.speaker: Lae'zel
82.text: I will be at your camp. Do not keep me waiting.

73.speaker: Lae'zel
73.text: You are full up. Dismiss your weakest warrior. I will wait here until you do.

74.speaker: Lae'zel
74.text: You have made an ally from Crèche K'liir - few know such fortune. Call me Lae'zel.

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: Onward. Our purification is at hand.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I am pursuing other means to a cure. I don't need whatever you're offering.

80.speaker: Lae'zel
80.text: Githyanki teaching is as infallible as Queen Vlaakith herself. To remove a tadpole, there are but two paths: purification at a crèche - or beheading.

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: Any other 'cure' might be offered is a lie. Cast it from your mind.

24.speaker: Lae'zel
24.text: An abomination grows within you, yet you would refuse purification?

8.speaker: Lae'zel
8.text: Bah. You invite your own misery. I will wait - perhaps you will come to your senses.

54.speaker: Lae'zel
54.text: Hurry. We must explore the crèche - there is more I would know.
